评论概述: Decent quality but design is off
评论详情: Admittedly I sometimes have trouble finding clothes that fit how I like but I tried these in my typical size and despite being "slim fit" they were more like straight or regular fit and way too baggy for my taste.  It's too bad because the quality seemed decent enough given the price under $30.

评论概述: Comfortable material, ran a tiny bit small in the waist.
评论详情: Nice lightweight stretchable material. Hope it holds up over time. Good stitching (no stray threads). Overall seems to be a good value. In the past, I usually get the other Amazon Essentials wrinkle resistant chinos which feel a little “thicker” more substantial material wise (and are less expensive than these stretch fabric ones). These feel a little more “synthetic” due to the stretch material but are very comfortable. The other chinos have a center crease (which I usually iron out with some effort as chinos are meant to be casual pants and creased pants are meant to be a little dressier), these stretch chinos do not and so are a little more casual. I wear the creased chinos (the non-stretch ones) when I go more “business” casual, and will use the non-creased stretch ones for “very” casual wear. Even though these were stretch (so it was “OK”) the waist ran about 1/2” smaller on these compared to the non-stretch Amazon chinos it have. Again, good value (not quite the quality of other Gap etc slightly higher end brands, but also basically at only about 60% the price). Will buy again if they hold up well.

The quality was much better than expected and the fit was perfect for functional use. Washer friendly and great for work use. Long term use required to judge durability. The style is perfect and matches well with other brands.
Fit great nice color

These are definitely not slim-fit pants. I’m 6’2 and ordered 33W 32L but these are too baggy and long, more like a 34L. (Ordered 2 colors, both are too baggy).  Also, sizing is inconsistent, one was a little bigger on the waist than the other (Same size)

评论概述: Fulfills Impulse to Dress Fiancé Up
评论详情: I got these for my fiancé who doesn’t particularly care about fashion. I however, very much enjoy dressing him up and because he has few inclinations towards fashion, I have relatively free rein. We both love these pants! They are SO soft and the color is exactly what I was looking for (very versatile). These pants have held up so well and it’s truly a miracle. I really, really like these pants and would probably wear them myself if I could. They don’t wrinkle very badly if at all (we just use wrinkle release if anything does need help with wrinkles). They wash well, retaining their shape and color. These pants are not flimsy despite how soft and comfy they are.

评论概述: Not slim fit. Quality is okay
评论详情: Quality is okay, but these aren't really slim fit. I wear 30w slim fit jeans from Amazon essentials, and they fit great. I recently put on some pounds and needed to size up. I decided to get 32w and ordered a few colors. Well, these are not really slim fit. They're pretty baggy and the don't taper down the pant leg. I tried shrinking them by washing in hot cycle, but they didn't shrink that much and still look baggy. Back when skinny jeans were in fashion, I tried on a pair and since it took too long to put on and take off, I never got into "skinny" fit pants. Well, I saw Amazon Essentials has skinny fit casual chinos and decided to get them since the slim fit were bigger than I expected. The skinny fit are perfect. Not baggy and a slight taper down the pant leg. If you're deciding on these slim fit chinos, I recommend you also pick up skinny fit chinos, see which one you like better, and return the one you don't like. Unfotunately, I already washed these slim-fit chinos to try to shrink them, so I can't return them.
Not for me
The fit of the pants is fine but after only one wash color faded so much they look really old. So new pants are now work pants for chores.
Arrived on time and fits great. The color is as described.

The rise is right. Good fit for short people. Front rise measures about 11 inch which is crucial. The pant is a bit too slim but manageable. Fabric is so so but makes up for the hard to get fit I haven't washed yet

I loved the pant the way it fits on me and the color of it. Perfect work pants.

I had bought a few of these in different colors a few years back. They were awesome. I lost some weight and recently ordered a few colors in the next size down. They are now thin, wrinkly and baggy. I returned them. The older ones were thicker material with a stretch waist. Its obvious they took all of this out because its cheaper to make and they get a better mark up. It would have been better if they kept the quality and charged more. If you can afford it spend another 20 bucks for a brand name. Amazon basics is going down hill and in my opinion its due to greed and  they think the best way to make a bigger profit is to give less for the same price. Hopefully they will find that it doesn't work. I would pay 10 bucks more for these pants if the quality was what it used to be.

These are cut exactly as I'd hoped.  The material, however, always has a look as if it badly needs ironing, even right out of the tumble dryer.  It needs something added to make it wrinkle-free and smooth out the fabric.  I'll keep it, but won't order more.

评论详情: I purchased these pants for my son who is 6 foot 3 inches, I ordered the 34 34 and they fit great. I was purchasing his khaki's from Target I believe the Goodfellow brand and I like these so much better. They feel like better quality. I think they will hold up better when I wash them.

评论概述: Nice, but received the wrong size
评论详情: I ordered a 34x30 and I got a 36x30
These pants fit perfectly and they were great value will buy again.

These khakis are just okay, even for their low price. The farbic is a little coarse and there's almost zero stretch whatsoever. I wouldn't care that much about it except they have MASSIVE sizing inconsistency issues, and I can't stress how much I am NOT exaggerating. I ordered two in khaki, two in grey, and two in olive, all in the same length, and no two pairs of these pants were remotely the same size. In some cases, when laid flat, there would be a full two inches of extra fabric in the waist between two identical sizes. They all also had hugely different lengths, with some resting right near my ankles, and some covering half my feet. I returned that set and ordered another, and the new set had the same problem, except this time one pair had two different length legs. There seems to be absolutely zero quality control, so if you want two pairs of the same color, I'd recommend ordering at least six, if not more, so you can find the two with the closest size and return the rest.
Arrived with large blemish on the front of the left leg

I purchased these pants for my son to wear to work. They have held up so well, even with him washing and wearing them several days a week. He works a very active job, often involving bending, and he says they are extremely comfortable. He loves them so much we just bought a second pair.
Brand new blue pants already showed up faded and discolored.
